vote.text: Amendment SA 3910 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3910 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Shelby to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5901; text: CR S5901) To make a technical amendment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3910 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Shelby to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3910 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
